title: Google is experimenting with smartphone cameras to detect cardiovascular risk factors and record heart sounds
content:
At its second annual “The Check Up” event on Thursday, Google shared its research on new health projects that aim to use smartphones to protect cardiovascular health, preserve eyesight, and record heart sound. The first project builds upon Google’s previous research, which tackled detecting cardiovascular risk factors such as high blood sugar and cholesterol levels

The post Google is experimenting with smartphone cameras to detect cardiovascular risk factors and record heart sounds appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google shared its research on some new health projects that aim to use smartphones to protect cardiovascular health and more.
